entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 p.m. EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2Â°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Local blowing snow. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local blowing snow in the evening and after midnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
